task_11.description: Place the yellow tissue on top of the green cup
task_11.initial_setup: The yellow tissue is folded and lying flat on the far right corner. The green paper cup is upright on the center of the table, 10 cm from the edge. A red plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the left side.
task_11.final_state: The yellow tissue is flat and placed directly on top of the green cup. The red cup is upright on the far left corner.
